text: Rafał Siadaczka (born 21 February 1972) is a retired Polish football defender.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:Broń Radom players Category:Legia Warsaw players Category:Radomiak Radom players Category:Wisła Płock players Category:Widzew Łódź players Category:FK Austria Wien players Category:Association football defenders Category:Polish expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Austria Category:Polish expatriate sportspeople in Austria Category:Poland international footballers
